Description: Large scarab in glazed steatite (?); back of scarab well detailed with incisions; underside incised with representation of sphinx holding a cartouche and name of Amun-Ra above back of sphinx; green glazed well preserved.
Curator's comments: Wah-ib-ra, the prenomen of Psamtik I or nomen of Apries, is rather frequent on scarabs of the 26th dynasty.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006, 26 Nov-26 Feb, Frankfurt, Liebieghaus, Egypt, Greece & Rome 2014-2015, 13 Nov-13 Feb, Paris, Musee du Louvre, Rhodos: a Gate from and to the Eastern Mediterranean
